snippet: Scott M. Stringer, the Manhattan borough president, is expected to announce that he will not run for mayor next year because he has been trailing far behind other candidates in early polls.
abstract: Scott M Stringer, Manhattan borough president, is expected to announce that he will not run for mayor in 2013, given how far he is trailing other likely Democratic contenders in early polls.
lead_paragraph: Scott M. Stringer, the Manhattan borough president, is expected to announce that he will not run for mayor next year because he has been trailing far behind other candidates in early polls.

headline.seo: Scott M. Stringer May Drop Ambition for Mayor’s Office
headline.main: Stringer May Drop Ambition for Mayor
headline.print_headline: Stringer May Drop Ambition For Mayor
